refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: polyconvert is an importer of polygon definitions.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: In the following, all possible options are presented.

Please remark, that the configuration-option may be used to supply a file that contains all other parameter's definition. Please take a look into the SUMO user documentation for further information about the usage of configuration files.

listitem.para: Specifies whether and which a configuration file shall be loaded. Optional, type:filename, default: none
Uses the given network as a reference to place the polygon properly. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
The elmar polygons-file to import. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
The type-map file to use. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
Defines the file to write the converted polygons to. Optional (pregiven), type:filename, default: "polygons.xml"
Defines the color to use as default. Optional (pregiven), type:color, default: "0.2,0.5,1." (light blue)
Defines into which layer the polygons shall be put by default. Optional (pregiven), type:int, default: -1 (one layer below the road network)
Defines the type-dependant prefix to apply to polygons. Optional (pregiven), type:string, default: <empty>
Defines the name of the type to set for the polygons. Optional (pregiven), type:string, default: "water"
Enables reprojection of the network's coordinates. Optional, type:bool, default: false
Defines projection. Please consult the PROJ-manual for further details. Optional (pregiven), type:string, default: "+proj=utm +zone=33 +ellps=bessel +units=m"
Initialises the random number generator with the current time (in ms) in the hope to make him generate really random numbers of an unknown order. Optional, type:bool, default: false
Initialises the random number generator with <SEED>. Optional, type:int, default: none
Prints some information about the process during execution. Optional, type:bool, default: false
No warnings will be prompted if this option is set. Optional, type:bool, default: false
Prints the current option settings before the execution starts. Optional, type:bool, default: false
All outputs (messages, warnings, and errors) will be written to <LOG_FILE_NAME>. Optional, type:filename, default: none
Prints the node positions during building. Optional (pregiven), type:bool, default: false

refsect1.title: USAGE
refsect1.para: The following topics should be described more precisely within the SUMO user documentation that may be found at http://sumo.sourceforge.net

polyconvert requires at least the SUMO-network and an input file. Additionally --use-projection should be set to true, unless this has not been done while converting the network. If no type-map file is given, the polygons will be converted using the default values for color, layer, type, and prefix. Otherwise these values are read from the type-map and given to the polygons in dependence to their types.
